content: John F. Kennedy, the 35th President of the United States, was assassinated on November 22, 1963, in Dallas, Texas. The official story is that Lee Harvey Oswald acted alone in shooting Kennedy from the sixth floor of the Texas School Book Depository building. However, there are many conspiracy theories surrounding Kennedy's assassination, including the theory that the CIA was involved. While there is no concrete evidence to support this theory, it remains a topic of ongoing debate and speculation.
